mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice_mst ORDER BY notice_code desc

SELECT nm.notice_code, nm.notice_title, nm.notice_writer, nm.notice_count, nm.notice_date, nd.update_date, nd.notice_content, nd.originFileNames, nd.tempFileNames FROM notice_mst nm LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_dtl nd ON(nd.notice_code = nm.notice_code) WHERE nm.notice_code = #{notice_code} LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_mst( notice_title, notice_writer, notice_date, notice_count ) VALUES( #{notice_title}, "닉네임 가져와야 함", NOW(), 0 );
mapper.select: SELECT max(notice_code) AS notice_code FROM notice_mst
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_dtl SET notice_content = #{notice_content}, originFileNames = #{originFileNames}, tempFileNames = #{tempFileNames} WHERE notice_code = #{notice_code}
